data.text:
@BAHjournalist @137pm @Jeff__Benjamin You make me proud of Army.
It is important to us, as  you know. 
Thank you for support 💜
#BTSonGMA

@BAHjournalist @137pm @Jeff__Benjamin I might be wrong but it seems that this translates directly into "BTS paved the way" 😎

@BTS_twt #BTSonGMA https://t.co/Jvyk4Tg57u

@BAHjournalist I love all of the guys and their colorful IDOL suits but if I must choose a favorite suit....
I'm torn between Jimin, Jungkook,  Taehyung and Suga https://t.co/Hz34nLRX7N

@BAHjournalist @137pm #BTS Has songs on their other albums and even predebut songs about voting, depression, the Korean education system, political& social commentary songs, their different accents bc they are not all from Seoul, loneliness- and they all participate. @BTS_twt

@THETonyMorrison @137pm @downwithmilk @BAHjournalist @GMA You don’t know how much of an impact you made by approaching BTS with clear eyes about their message and character instead of pushing the boy band heartthrob narrative. I confess I didn’t watch morning news before but you guys were so professional that I’m won over.

@THETonyMorrison @137pm @downwithmilk @BAHjournalist Thank you and @GMA. I literally just got off the phone with my relatives. They hadn’t heard of BTS before and they were impressed and had tons of questions. You guys hit this out of the park for the general audience too. +

@BAHjournalist @137pm @Jeff__Benjamin Tyvm! A well written article & definitely a different POV from the digital aspect. The engagement with everyone is awesome & positively contagious, even afterwards! 💜
@BAHjournalist @137pm @Jeff__Benjamin Yes! The biggest boy band in the world @BTS_twt 🙌

I wrote about my #BTSonGMA experience for @137pm! I compared the energy in Times Square from the BTS #ARMY to the early NSYNC/Backstreet Boys era and interviewed K-pop expert @Jeff__Benjamin about why BTS's appearance is important 👇🏾
https://t.co/q5hpC64JeR

@BAHjournalist @137pm @GMA @BTS_twt @THETonyMorrison Bc you made army happy
We can easily do this for you 💜💜💜
@BAHjournalist @137pm @GMA @BTS_twt @THETonyMorrison This is what happens when you make a great content ;)

🔥 EXCLUSIVE #BTSonGMA STATS: This hashtag has been mentioned 2.4 MILLION times since Sept. 19, with 1.5 MILLION of those mentions occurring today from 4 a.m. to noon, a Twitter spokesperson just told me and @137pm upon request. @GMA gave the #BTS #ARMY everything they dreamed of https://t.co/PAOL1Ghpc7

@Win22_twt @BAHjournalist @michaelstrahan @BTS_twt Ankara is correct. We normally just call it African print fabrics. It's good to have a diverse fandom so we can learn about different cultures. 😊

@BAHjournalist JHopes suit is my fave..no wait Jimin's is cute...hmm but Jungkook's tho..actually Suga rocked it but Jin's was gorgeous..seriously Taheyung looked fineeeee but RM was hella handsome as always...THEY ALL LOOK AMAZING OKAY 😍😍😍😍

@Win22_twt @BAHjournalist @michaelstrahan @BTS_twt Hey it's the dance moves that are South African but the suits are Ghanaian. That's where that fabric originates from.  Love an African Army 😊💜
@BAHjournalist @michaelstrahan Those are African Print suits called Ankara suits. You can order one on an African Designer website.
